attributes.action: Save Battersea Power Station's original chimneys from demolition
attributes.additional_details: Save the world-famous 4 chimneys of Battersea Power Station from demolition and replacement with replicas.  They are beloved by artists, historians, residents and visitors and have stood proud for over fifty years.  They deserve to be repaired as they stand, demolition could create further long-term damage to this Grade 2 listed monument.
